response.original_title: Chine, le nouvel empire: La Chine s'Ã©veille
response.overview: Home to a fifth of the world's population, the newly-minted superpower will soon be the largest economy on earth. Yet it remains little understood in the West. This three-part documentary offers a bold step towards overturning that ignorance. With the most sumptuous production values possible, it skilfully glides from historical enquiry to current analysis in a deep yet accessible tour de force. Timely, comprehensive, and magisterial.
response.title: China New Empire - Part 1: China Awakens
